title: lost all msg's in inbox
content:
hi all

have somehow got an imap and a pop3 [version of the same acct] acct on my main pc , but they are are the same TB acct if that makes sense. suddenly ive lost all msg's in inbox.

have opened Tb in troublshoot mode but no help. i also did an "impoort" which was no help 

i have 2 inboxs with associated folders [which i don't want]. i was tackleling a problem with this acct in another thread and appreciate peoples input there, but it was not completely resolved

i suspect i need to change both accts to either pop2 or imap , preferably the one where data is kept on a server so acct is syced with my laptop pc

any help much appreciated. thanx

update: just now i did a second "Import", this was successful and recoverd my inbox msg's, but id still like some help getting back to normal, thanks
creator: stinkydog

title: Thunderbird en Edge? Ik gebruik Firefox.
content:

creator: AKostenzer

title: Cannot log in to aol email account on Windows 11
content: I am trying to transition from Windows 10 to 11 but cannot log in to my AOL email account on the Windows 11 device. A message comes back "Edge: Too many requests". Presumably this refers to Windows Edge? although I have set Firefox as the default browser. I have set up my Gmail account without problem and the AOL configuration is correct. I can log in OK if I visit the AOL webpage and also still log in from the Windows 10 device. Any help would be gratefully received.
creator: bernardmabon

content:

Could you please help me restore or reconnect this email account?

Thank you in advance for your assistance.

Best regards, Susanne på Dromformen.se info@dromformen.se

title: Gmail account setup on a mac
content:
I'm on a Mac using T-bird with 5 other mail accounts. Trying to setup Gmail account. Using T-bird auto setup and have checked with manual configuration that okay (or what I think is okay). Authentication set to 0Auth2. Password I'm using is same one that works for webmail.

When I hit Done button for set up it takes me to a signin page (see Image-1). When I hit Next it gives me an error page (see Image-2).

What am I doing wrong? Thank you.
creator: dpauker

title: TB - Search Messages with date isue
content:
When I attempt to search for emails with a date (such as after Sept 30, 2025) in the INBOX plus subfolders (checked off), it only returns those in the INBOX. There are emails in subfolders dated after Sept 30, 2025.

If I search for a word without any date, it lists all emails. If I add a 2nd condition with a date as noted above, only the INBOX is displayed. Is this a bug?
creator: hpatlik

title: Windows 11 Thunderbird showing 2 accounts, only 1 has data in Profile
content: I added two accounts to my Thunderbird installation, mine and my wife's. Both show the same one Profile folder in Help > Troubleshooting. But when I backup these huge folders (Local and Roaming) by copying them, only my email address seems to be present in file and subfolder names, not my wife's. Is her account not there in my Profile? Why? Can I get it in there?
creator: careymann
